name: Rogue Company: Radioactive Revenant Pack
description:
Give your opponents a fright with the Radioactive Revenant Pack! This pack features an exclusive outfit for Ronin, a spooky wingsuit, and a reactive weapon wrap that can be used on any weapon type.

Includes: - Radioactive Revenant Ronin - Radioactive Revenant Primary Wrap - Radioactive Revenant Secondary Wrap - Radioactive Revenant Melee Wrap - Radioactive Revenant Wingsuit
